IRAS Consent: {{ irasConsent?.consentInd === 'Y' ? 'Yes' : 'No' }} ({{ irasConsent?.consentDate | date:'dd-MM-yyyy' }})
SN Receipt Date Call-up Empty Claim Sent Prepop EC Sent Prepop EC Received Prepop SE Sent Prepop SE Received {{ i + 1 }} {{ i + 1 }} {{ record.receiptDt | date:'dd-MM-yyyy' }} {{ record.callUpStartDt | date:'dd-MM-yyyy (HHmm)' }}
{{ record.callUpEndDt | date:'dd-MM-yyyy (HHmm)' }} {{ record.emptyClaimSentDt | date:'dd-MM-yyyy' }} No data retrieved
{{ ecSent }}
{{ ecReceived }}
No data retrieved {{ record.prepopSESent }}
{{ seReceived }}
No records found. import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { LazyLoadEvent } from 'primeng/api'; import { Ns2HttpService } from 'app/shared/service/ns2-http.service'; import { CustomToastService } from 'app/layouts/service/customtoast.service'; import { DateUtilsService } from 'app/core/util/date-utils.service'; import { ExportUtilsService } from 'app/core/util/export-utils.service'; import { EnquiryNSmanService } from 'app/enquiry/nsman/service/enquiry-nsman.service'; import { Table } from 'primeng/table'; import { EnqPrepopEclaimTab } from 'app/enquiry/nsman/model/nsman-tabs.model'; import { NSmanPersonalInfo } from 'app/enquiry/nsman/model/nsman.model'; import { SEClaimService } from 'app/claim/se-claim/service/se-claim.service'; import { IrasConsent } from 'app/claim/model/nsman-consent.model'; @Component({ selector: 'n2-nsman-pre-populated-eclaim-tab', templateUrl: './nsman-pre-populated-eclaim-tab.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nsman-pre-populated-eclaim-tab.component.scss'] }) export class NsmanPrePopulatedEclaimTabComponent implements OnInit { @Input() nsmanInfo: NSmanPersonalInfo; displayIrasConsentHistoryDialog: any = { display: false }; displayRecordDialog: any = { display: false }; // LazyLoad variables totalRecords?: number; loading?: boolean; pageData: { currentPage: number } = { currentPage: 0 } pageSize = 10; lazyLoadEvent: LazyLoadEvent; nric: string; callUpId: string; irasConsent: IrasConsent; prepopEclaimList: EnqPrepopEclaimTab[] = []; constructor( private ns2HttpService: Ns2HttpService, private toastService: CustomToastService, private seClaimService: SEClaimService, private dateUtilsService: DateUtilsService, private exportUtilsService: ExportUtilsService, private enquiryNSmanService: EnquiryNSmanService, ) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.retrieveIrasConsent(); } load(event: LazyLoadEvent): void { setTimeout(() => { this.loading = true; this.lazyLoadEvent = event; const options = this.ns2HttpService.convertLazyEvent(event, this.pageData, this.pageSize); options.params = options.params.append("nric", this.nsmanInfo.nric); this.enquiryNSmanService.getPrepopEclaimTab(options).subscribe(resp => { if (resp.body?.data?.content) { this.prepopEclaimList = resp.body.data.content; this.totalRecords = resp.body.data.totalElements; } else { this.prepopEclaimList = []; this.totalRecords = 0; } this.loading = false; }); }, 0); } onPage(event: any): void { this.pageSize = event.rows; this.pageData.currentPage = event.first / event.rows; } retrieveIrasConsent(): void { this.seClaimService.retrieveIrasConsent(this.nsmanInfo.nric).subscribe(resp => { if (resp.body?.data) { this.irasConsent = resp.body.data; } else { this.irasConsent.consentInd = ''; this.irasConsent.consentDate = null; } }); this.nric = this.nsmanInfo.nric; } onOpenIrasConsentHistoryDialog(): void { this.displayIrasConsentHistoryDialog.display = true; } onOpenRecordDialog(id: string): void { this.callUpId = id; this.displayRecordDialog.display = true; } onCloseRecordDialog(): void { this.callUpId = ''; this.displayRecordDialog.display = false; } exportCSV(dataTable: Table): void { const options = this.ns2HttpService.convertLazyEvent(this.lazyLoadEvent, 0, this.totalRecords); options.params = options.params.append("nric", this.nsmanInfo.nric); this.enquiryNSmanService.getPrepopEclaimTab(options).subscribe( resp => { if (resp.body?.data?.content) { const data = resp.body?.data?.content; const columns = [ { field: 'sn', header: 'SN', index: 0 }, { field: 'receiptDt', header: 'receiptDt', index: 1 }, { field: 'callUp', header: 'Call-up', index: 2 }, { field: 'emptyClaimSent', header: 'Empty Claim Sent', index: 3 }, { field: 'prepopECSent', header: 'Prepop EC Sent', index: 4 }, { field: 'prepopECReceived', header: 'Prepop EC Received', index: 5 }, { field: 'prepopSESent', header: 'Prepop SE Sent', index: 6 }, { field: 'prepopSEReceived', header: 'Prepop SE Received', index: 7 }, ]; const dtoList: any[] = []; console.log("data", data); data.forEach((record: EnqPrepopEclaimTab, index: number) => { const dto = { sn: index + 1, receiptDt: `${String(this.dateUtilsService.formatStrDate(record.receiptDt, "DD-MM-YYYY"))}`, callUp: `${String(this.dateUtilsService.formatStrDate(record.callUpStartDt, "DD-MM-YYYY (HHmm)"))} to ${String(this.dateUtilsService.formatStrDate(record.callUpEndDt, "DD-MM-YYYY (HHmm)"))}`, emptyClaimSent: `${String(this.dateUtilsService.formatStrDate(record.emptyClaimSentDt, "DD-MM-YYYY"))}`, prepopECSent: record.prepopECSent, prepopECReceived: record.prepopECReceived, prepopSESent: record.prepopSESent, prepopSEReceived: record.prepopSEReceived, } dtoList.push(dto); }); this.exportUtilsService.exportCSV(dataTable, dtoList, resp.body.data.totalElements, columns, "Enquiry Prepoplated Eclaim Tab"); } }, error => { console.log(error.error?.error_desc); this.loading = false; }) } }
